actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize the documentation as vessels of the United States of foreign built vessels of 100 net tons or less for use in the U.S. fisheries while owned by U.S. citizens or corporations.

summary.text: Provides that a foreign built vessel of one hundred net tons or less may be documented as a vessel of the United States and used in the United States fisheries if it is wholly owned by a United States citizen or corporation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the documentation as vessels of the United States of foreign built vessels of 100 net tons or less for use in the U.S. fisheries while owned by U.S. citizens or corporations.
